title: HELP I have been permanently suspended
body:
User Name: thechirtmasapple
Summoner Name: christmasapple
Hi, I haven't been on league of legends for 2 days and when I came back on I was permanently suspended, no one has been on my account. I like to think I am nice to other players, please help.

replies.body:
You should have received a reform card to the email registered to your account. You may have to check your spam folder.

The email ought to tell you why you were banned.
